html:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Velodyne Lidar Inc VLDR.O:

  • VELODYNE LIDAR INC - AGREED TO ISSUE TO SUBSIDIARY OF AMAZON A WARRANT TO ACQUIRE UP TO 39.6 MILLION SHARES OF COMPANY'S COMMON STOCK

  • VELODYNE LIDAR INC - VESTING OF WARRANT SHARES BASED ON DISCRETIONARY PAYMENTS MADE BY AMAZON PURSUANT TO EXISTING COMMERCIAL AGREEMENTS

  • VELODYNE LIDAR - WARRANT MAY BE EXERCISED AT ANY TIME BEFORE FEBRUARY 4, 2030 AT EXERCISE PRICE OF $4.18 PER SHARE

  • VELODYNE LIDAR - AMAZON HAS RIGHT TO DESIGNATE A BOARD OBSERVER TO CO'S BOARD IF NUMBER OF SHARES THAT IT OR AFFILIATES HOLDS, EQUALS AT LEAST 12.3 MILLION SHARES

Further company coverage: VLDR.O
